Pearl BuiIY

Arizona Public Service Com
panys sergeant Safety traf-
fic education program has been
named by Public Relations News
magazine as one of the nations
10 outstanding public relations
programs.


The presentation features Jack
Ashley, former Phoenix police
officer, as the star of a safety
education show brought to ele-
mentary school children in the
companys service area.


AS Sergeant Safety he has
visited more than 200 schools
while teaching traffic safety fun
damentals to more than 100000
children, from kindergarten
through third grade.


Originated by the utility in
1862, the safety show has been
acclaimed by school administra-
tors and law enforcement Off
Gals as an effective tool for
teaching the "rules of the road
to Arizona's young people.


Among other honors, Ashley
has been cited by Arizona Gov
ernor Paul Fannin for render
ing invaluable service to the
cause of safety among young
sters.'

NEW YORK = Elizabeth Taylor
and Richard Burton will partic-
ipate in the NAACPs two-hour
closed = circuit television show
Thursday, May IA. Others con-
senting to appear are Della
Reese, Godfrey Cambridge and
Robert Preston.


The program, to be viewed
in theaters and movie houses,
will be an NAACP Embarrassing
effort In observance of the 1854
Supreme Court ruling on school
desegregation. Also the NAACP
will use the occasion to honor
Judge Thurgood Marshall, of the
u .S.Court of Appeals for the
Second Circuit.

Liz And Dick To
Be On NAACP
Show May Ia

Arizona Public Service Com

fic education program has been

The presentation features Jack
